ailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>

  Subject: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC



  Hello,

  This email=
 message is a notification to let you know that
  a file has been uploaded =
to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
  group.

  File : /Ann's files/hello_lis=
by021108.mp3 
  Uploaded by : lisbyfarrum <lisby@...<mailto:lisby=
@...>> 
  Description : Someone says, "Hello, Lisby." 

  You can=
 access this file at the URL:
  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files=
/Ann%27s%20files/hello_lisby021108.mp3<http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-IT=
C/files/Ann%27s%20files/hello_lisby021108.mp3>

roups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles<http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo=
/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles>

  Regards,

  lisbyfarrum <l=
isby@...<mailto:lisby%40earthlink.net>>
